metadata.title: CVE-2019-20386 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in button_open in login/logind-button.c in systemd before 243. When executing the udevadm trigger command, a memory leak may occur.

criterions.comment: systemd package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '244-3ubuntu1').
